summary.span: Represents a collection of objects in the control.

span.span: Represents a collection of objects in the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 包含允许的对象控件来显示每个自定义的网格样式中。The contains objects that allows the control to display a customized grid style for each in a . 上控件，属性返回。On the control, the property returns the . 默认情况下，不包含任何对象。By default, the does not contain any objects. 相反，显示使用默认设置进行颜色、 宽度和格式设置每个表。Instead, the displays each table using default settings for color, width, and formatting. 将显示每个表的所有列。All columns of each table are displayed. 当添加到集合，使用来确定哪些对象提供的数据网格。When a is added to the collection, the uses the to determine which object supplies the data for the grid. 例如，如果数据源是，其中包含三个对象，必须匹配的其中一个对象。For example, if the data source is a that contains three objects, the must match the of one of the objects. 如果的任何不匹配值，则默认的设置将用于显示的每个表的数据和设置将被忽略。If the does not match any of the values, the default settings will be used to display data for each table, and the settings will be ignored. > [!CAUTION] > 始终创建对象，并将其添加到之前添加对象添加到。Always create objects and add them to the before adding objects to the . 当你将添加一个空使用一个有效到集合中，值自动为你生成的对象。When you add an empty with a valid value to the collection, objects are automatically generated for you. 如果你尝试添加新因此，将引发异常对象具有重复值复制到。Consequently, an exception will be thrown if you try to add new objects with duplicate values to the . 或者，清除使用方法。Alternatively, clear the using the method. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建两个对象并将每个到返回属性控件。The following code example creates two objects and adds each to the returned by the property of a control. [!code-cpp[GridTableStylesCollectionExamples#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/GridTableStylesCollectionExamples/CPP/gridtablestylescollectionexamples.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[GridTableStylesCollectionExamples#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/GridTableStylesCollectionExamples/CS/gridtablestylescollectionexamples.cs#1)] [!code-vb[GridTableStylesCollectionExamples#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/GridTableStylesCollectionExamples/VB/gridtablestylescollectionexamples.vb#1)]
